p: (in the Discussion) “Simulating these movements in a real landscape of population movement patterns, inferred from population movements assessed by mobile phones and other data ( Garcia et al., 2014), as well as parametric movement models ( Simini et al., 2013) is a logical next step, and can be used in future targeting of interventions and potential new treatments in both the current and future outbreaks ( Brady et al., 2014; Goodman, 2014).”
